kpi.name: M1008C302

kpi_info.title: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UE NACK
kpi_info.use: "The number of failed Multi-Band Load Balancing (MBLB) IFHOs due to negative UE response. This is a common failure counter for attempt counters M1008C296, M1008C297, M1008C298 and M1008C299. UPDATED: When the UE responds with RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE (or other RRC nack) and remains in the original cell in Cell_DCH state."

kpi.kpi_alias: FAILED MBLB IFHO DUE TO UE NACK
